item.title: CVE-2023-6769|2023-12-20T09:50:44.480Z -- amazing%20little%20poll -- amazing%20little%20poll
item.description: Stored XSS vulnerability in Amazing Little Poll, affecting versions 1.3 and 1.4. This vulnerability allows a remote attacker to store a malicious JavaScript payload in the "lp_admin.php" file in the "question" and "item" parameters. This vulnerability could lead to malicious JavaScript execution while the page is loading.
